T02D2250:140a-1: t'attva ma h'a y'a na bidha ti /
T02D2250:140a-2: bod skad dim de kho na nyid theg pa chen po nyi shu pa /
T02D2250:140a-3: rje btsun sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2250:140a-4: shes rab sna tshogs rnam pa smin//
T02D2250:140a-5: rnam med dang ni rnam nyed bral //
T02D2250:140a-7: gang phyir 'gro ba khyab pa'i bdag / shes rab srid dang mnyam bdag nyid //
T02D2250:140a-8: sku gsum theg pa'i gsum pa 'dis //
T02D2250:140a-9: de nyid 'khor lo bde ba'i thabs //
T02D2250:140a-10: de ni rnal 'byor bdag dang gzhan //
T02D2250:140a-11: 'jam dpal rdo rje sgyu ma che //
T02D2250:140a-12: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gzhan //
T02D2250:140a-13: snang ba'i bye brag shes rab nyid //
T02D2250:140a-14: de nyid rgyal ba'i bdag nyid grol //
T02D2250:140a-15: bsam gyis mi khyab sems pa nyid //
T02D2250:140a-16: gnyis dang gnyis med de bzhin no //
T02D2250:140a-17: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
T02D2250:140b-0: dngos dang @140b dngos med gzung dang 'dzin //
T02D2250:140b-1: rnam par shes pas bor ba'i sems //
T02D2250:140b-2: dmigs pa med cing bla na med //
T02D2250:140b-3: dag cing zhi ba snang ba med //
T02D2250:140b-4: rig pa shes rab ces su grags //
T02D2250:140b-5: 'di la zhugs par gyur pa ni //
T02D2250:140b-6: gsang sngags chos kyis rnam par gsal //
T02D2250:140b-7: gang phyir sna tshogs pa yi thabs //
T02D2250:140b-9: las dang dam tshig phyag rgya dang //
T02D2250:140b-10: 'khor lo rdzogs par sgom pa nyid //
T02D2250:140b-11: mtha' ma'i byang chub bsam gtan de //
T02D2250:140b-12: dag pa'i de nyid kha phyir bltas //
T02D2250:140b-13: ye shes phyag rgya snyoms 'jug pas //
T02D2250:140b-14: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs gtso //
T02D2250:140b-15: bden min brdzun gyi rnam pa min //
T02D2250:140b-17: bdag byin brlab pa'i go 'phang shes //
T02D2250:140b-18: gang phyir de nyid nus pa med //
T02D2250:140b-19: de rnams la ni yang dag bstan //
T02D2250:140b-20: rim gyis byang chub grub pa'o //
T02D2250:140b-21: lha rnams mngon par dgod ce na //
T02D2250:140b-22: 'di la bag chags ci tshe med //
T02D2250:140b-23: bag chags nyid ni rnam dag na //
T02D2250:140b-24: thams cad du yang de bzhin no //
T02D2250:140b-25: slar yang rnal 'byor de nyid mthong //
T02D2250:140b-26: phyag rgya che la mchog tu gzhol //
T02D2250:140b-27: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi //
T02D2250:140b-28: dbang po mchog gis gnas par bya //
T02D2250:140b-29: ngo bo nyid kyi bde thob pas //
T02D2250:140b-30: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02D2250:140b-31: gang phyir 'gro ba de nyid yin //
T02D2250:140b-32: de phyir thams cad rtog pa med //
T02D2250:140b-33: phyi rol dngos yid kyis gzung la //
T02D2250:140b-35: rmi lam bud med gsal ba nyid //
T02D2250:140b-36: sems can don ni byed pa ste ;
T02D2250:140b-37: / thams cad dngos pa'i rang bzhin 'di //
T02D2250:140b-38: sems tsam du 'gyur byang chub po //
T02D2250:140b-39: sems kyi 'dod pa sems ma yin //
T02D2250:140b-40: rang gis rig pa sems min te //
T02D2250:140b-41: rig pa bla ma la stos 'gyur //
T02D2250:140b-42: dngos med kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
T02D2250:140b-44: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di //
T02D2250:140b-45: so sor rtogs par dka' ba yin //
T02D2250:140b-46: de la sogs pa 'dus pa na //
T02D2250:140b-48: de ltar de bzhin nyid dag la //
T02D2250:140b-49: ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur //
T02D2250:140b-50: gang la bsam pa bsam gtan yin //
T02D2250:140b-51: de la bsam mi khyab kyis min //
T02D2250:141a-2: sangs rgyas kyis ni grol bar bstan //
T02D2250:141a-4: gang phyir phyag rgya che de nyid //
T02D2250:141a-5: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste //
T02D2250:141a-6: gang phyir de ni rnam kun yin //
T02D2250:141a-7: bya ba byas pas bsam dang bral //
T02D2250:141a-8: dogs pa kun la kha phyir bltas //
T02D2250:141a-9: spyod lam rnam pa bzhi ldan pa //
T02D2250:141a-10: sangs rgyas 'di ni sangs rgyas bzhed //
T02D2250:141a-11: gnyis med gnyis su med pas byas //
T02D2250:141a-12: bdag gis thob pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02D2250:141a-13: de ni 'gro ba gnyis med nyid //
T02D2250:141a-14: de yis bde ba chen por shog / aa wa
T02D2250:141a-15: dh'u t'i pa gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2250:141a-17: / rje btsun dhi ri shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas /
